name: Idle SWAT Academy Tycoon
description:
Train up the most elite SWAT team in the entire world! This isn’t your normal police squad. Invest in your academy and soon your recruits will be ready for the toughest dispatch missions!

Earn cash and gold to spend on more training areas. Idle your time away while your recruits work and train. Become a rich SWAT tycoon billionaire while building up your base of operations!

There are several training areas where your recruits need to train to get ready for action. They include:

Breach Training - knock down doors and get ready for action
Firearms Training - get down to the shooting range and perfect your aim
Obstacle Course - you’ve got to be fit to be be the best
Close Quarter Combat Training - sometimes you’re going to have to face up
Canine Training - Police dogs are your best friend, so let their nose do the work
Tech Training - It’s the 21st century, so get robot and drone tech to help solve the crime
Shoot House - the classic hostage situation training - storm buildings or planes, clear rooms and find the enemy
Bomb Squad - a steady hand is needed here to defuse bombs and save. The day
Rappel Training - you’ve got to be able to quickly get down ropes to access windows and elevator shafts
Car Pursuit - hone your driving skills so you’re ready for the craziest getaway drivers on the road
Car Ramming - sometimes you’re going to have to take the enemy off the road
Sniper Training - a steady arm and a deep breath to take out the baddies at long distance

Unlock different missions depending on how you build your academy. Have they taken hostages? Send in the negotiator squad! Drugs found? Time for the canine unit! They’re trying to escape? Get your crack car pursuit officers on the job! You’re the sheriff in this town!

This isn’t your normal Police Academy training centre. No, this is for the elite SWAT teams, training to protect the people with the toughest training. There will be no time to idle about here!

So are you ready to train your recruits to be the finest SWAT men and women to protect the people? Earn money to upgrade all your areas and become a tycoon with millions and billions of dollars to invest back into your academy. Keep the streets safe with the best training facilities for your academy. It’s what tycoons do to keep our people safe! Don’t idle officer…get to work now!
